apps.name: Null's Brawl
apps.subtitle: An modified version of Brawl Stars.
apps.localizedDescription:
Null's Brawl is an modded version of Brawl Stars that can connect to the Null's servers with the following Features:
• Clubs
• Multiplayer
• Ranked Mode competition
• Friend List
• Global and Local leaderboards
• Special Offers are available in the Shop
• All Brawlers can be unlocked
• All skins, sprays, pins, gadgets, star powers, gears and hypercharges are available to use
• Null’s Connect
• Replays
• Brawl TV
• Brawl Pass rewards are available
• Friendly battles
• Exclusive settings for friendly battles
• Classic, special and hidden gamemodes are available to play
• Map Maker
• Exclusive modifiers

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo library access is needed if player contacts Supercell Player Support to send screenshots.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is needed for scanning QR codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Null's Brawl would like permission to track you across apps and websites owned by other companies. Your data will be used for audience insights, analytics and improving our services.

apps.name: OrangeStars
apps.subtitle: An modified version of Null's Brawl.
apps.localizedDescription: OrangeStars is an modded version of Null's Brawl that can connect to the Null's servers too and but with a funky twist!

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo library access is needed if player contacts Supercell Player Support to send screenshots.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera access is needed for scanning QR codes.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Null's Brawl would like permission to track you across apps and websites owned by other companies. Your data will be used for audience insights, analytics and improving our services.

news.title: Valentin ist Lustig!
news.caption: That's the truth and you can't escape it!

news.title: Null's Brawl now availible!
news.caption: Null's is now part of the OrangeSource! Go play with friends or with people around the world on Null's Brawl Stars servers!
